question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. yellow traffic sign
B. traffic light
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The yellow traffic sign is in the foreground, mounted on a pole near the road, while the traffic light is further back on a utility pole, making the sign clearly closer to the camera.
